name: Circuitous Road
description:
Created at Train Jam 2019 in 2 days!

This is a simple puzzle game where you must make the longest road possible between the start and end points, avoiding water tiles and working with or around hard-set road tiles. High scores are saved on each map so you can compete with your friends!

Many thanks to those who played my game on the train and gave me feedback, it was very valuable.
